description:
The Vice President of Sales will play a pivotal role in identifying and securing new business opportunities, expanding our customer base, and driving revenue growth. You will be responsible for developing and implementing strategies to promote our CNC machining and metal and polymer additive services, expanding relationships with existing clients, cultivating relationships with potential clients and winning new business, and ensuring the long-term success of our business through sustainable, profitable growth.

Description

Summary

Rennscot MFG specializes in advanced manufacturing solutions and offers precision CNC machining, metal additive manufacturing, and polymer printing services. Our goal is to support our customers from CAD model to finished part, ready to be shipped to their customers or installed in an assembly. Our current business development focus is on production-volume CNC machined components, metal additive components, and the post machining of additively manufactured metal components.

The Vice President of Sales will play a pivotal role in identifying and securing new business opportunities, expanding our customer base, and driving revenue growth. You will be responsible for developing and implementing strategies to promote our CNC machining and metal and polymer additive services, expanding relationships with existing clients, cultivating relationships with potential clients and winning new business, and ensuring the long-term success of our business through sustainable, profitable growth.

Responsibilities

Strategic Collaboration:
• Work closely with the President & CEO and Vice President of Operations to identify available and forecasted capacity, as well as key areas for business development focus.
• Understand the cost structure and market pricing to develop attractive, profitable proposals for clients.
• Collaborate with internal teams, including engineering, production, and quality assurance, to ensure seamless project initiation and execution, and superior customer satisfaction.
• Provide valuable feedback and insights to improve operational processes, enhance product offerings, and elevate overall customer experiences.

Market Research and Analysis:
• Conduct in-depth market research to identify potential customers, analyze industry trends, and assess the competitive landscape.
• Utilize market data to identify growth opportunities and develop targeted strategies that drive business expansion.

Sales and Lead Generation:
• Proactively identify and qualify new leads through various channels, including cold calling, networking, referrals, and online platforms.
• Build and maintain a robust sales pipeline to meet or exceed sales targets.
• Conduct sales presentations and demonstrations to showcase our capabilities and solutions to potential clients.
• Negotiate and close sales agreements, contracts, and strategic partnerships.

Customer Relationship Management:
• Develop and nurture strong relationships with key decision-makers and stakeholders at client organizations.
• Understand customer needs, requirements, and pain points to propose tailored solutions that address their specific challenges.
• Provide exceptional customer service and ensure customer satisfaction and retention throughout the entire engagement lifecycle.

Business Strategy and Planning:
• Collaborate with the executive team to develop and execute the company's business development strategy, aligned with our overall growth objectives.
• Identify new market segments and verticals for expansion and diversification, keeping a close eye on industry trends, competitor activities, and technological advancements.
• Identify opportunities and build a business case to add capabilities and capacity to meet customer needs.
• Recommend strategic adjustments and innovative approaches based on market insights.

Required Skills & Qualifications
• Bachelor's degree in business administration, engineering, or a related field.
• Proven experience in a business development or sales role within the CNC machining or metal additive industry.
• Strong knowledge of CNC machining processes, metal 3D printing technologies, and their applications.
• Excellent sales and negotiation skills, with a track record of achieving or exceeding sales targets.
• Demonstrated ability to build and maintain relationships with clients and key stakeholders.
• Analytical mindset with the ability to conduct market research, identify trends, and develop effective strategies.
• Exceptional communication and presentation skills, with the ability to effectively convey technical information to both technical and non-technical audiences.
• Self-motivated, proactive, and results-oriented, with the ability to work independently and as part of a team.
• Strong organizational and time management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines.

Company Benefits
• Company sponsored health, dental, and vision insurance
• Long-term disability insurance
• Annual vacation and personal days
• Floating holidays
• On-site employee gym
• 401(k) with company match
• Electric Vehicle incentive program
• Share Appreciation Rights (SARs) program

Rennscot is an Equal Opportunity Employer; employment with Rennscot is governed on the basis of merit, competence and qualifications and will not be influenced in any manner by race, color, religion, gender, national origin/ethnicity, veteran status, disability status, age, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, mental or physical disability or any other legally protected status.
